module.name: firstboot
module.summary: Final system configuration run during the first boot after installation of Red Hat/Fedora systems.

interface.name: firstboot_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute firstboot in the firstboot domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: firstboot_run
interface.summary: Execute firstboot in the firstboot domain, and allow the specified role the firstboot domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the firstboot domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the firstboot domain to use.

interface.name: firstboot_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use a file descriptor from firstboot.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: firstboot_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit a file descriptor from firstboot.

interface.name: firstboot_write_pipes
interface.summary: Write to a firstboot unnamed pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: firstboot_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and Write to a firstboot unnamed pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: firstboot_dontaudit_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attemps to read and write to a firstboot unnamed pipe.
